2025-07-17.content: **Conversational Agents**: CMEK is now available in EU regions.

summary.title: CMEK now in EU
summary.summary: CMEK for conversational agents is now available in EU regions.

2025-07-17.content: **Conversational Agents**: The [conversational history flow analysis feature](https://cloud.google.com/dialogflow/cx/docs/concept/conversation-history#flow-analysis-table) is now available.

summary.title: New Flow Analysis Feature
summary.summary: Analyze conversation history with the new flow analysis feature for conversational agents.

2025-07-17.content:
**Conversational Agents**: The [model](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/learn/model-versions) `gemini-2.5-flash` is now available in all regions. This change applies to the following features:

* Generators
* Playbooks (Public Preview)
* Data stores tools (Public Preview)

summary.title: Gemini 2.5 Flash Now Available in All Regions
summary.summary: The Gemini 2.5 Flash model is now available in all regions for features including Generators, Playbooks (Public Preview), and Data Stores tools (Public Preview).

2025-06-26.content: **Conversational Agents data stores**: Conversational Agents now supports AlloyDB, Bigtable, Firestore, Spanner and Cloud SQL [data store sources](https://cloud.google.com/dialogflow/cx/docs/concept/data-store#sources) as public GA features. Microsoft Entra ID source has now private GA support.

summary.title: New data store sources available in Dialogflow CX
summary.summary: Dialogflow CX has added support for several new data store sources, including AlloyDB, Bigtable, Firestore, Spanner, and Cloud SQL, as public GA features. Microsoft Entra ID now has private GA support.

2025-06-26.content: **Conversational Agents data stores**: You can now create some data store types directly within the Conversational Agents console rather than needing to use AI Applications. See the [data store creation documentation](https://cloud.google.com/dialogflow/cx/docs/concept/data-store/handler#data-store-console) for details.

summary.title: Data Stores Now Available in Conversational Agents Console
summary.summary: You can now create data stores directly in the Conversational Agents console, simplifying the process. Previously, this required using AI Applications.

2025-06-12.content: **Conversational Agents**: New [Chirp 3 HD](https://cloud.google.com/text-to-speech/docs/chirp3-hd) Cloud Text-to-Speech voice **Autonoe** is now available.

summary.title: New Autonoe voice available
summary.summary: Autonoe, a new voice from Cloud Text-to-Speech, is now available. This voice is part of the Chirp 3 HD family.

2025-06-12.content: **Conversational Agents**: Conversational Agents console now supports [test cases](https://cloud.google.com/dialogflow/cx/docs/concept/test-case).

summary.title: Test Cases for Conversational Agents
summary.summary: You can now use test cases to test your conversational agents in the console.

2025-06-12.content: **Conversational Agents**: Service agent access tokens used for authentication by both webhooks and tools are now discontinued as mentioned in notification emails to customers earlier this year. Most customers can use service accounts instead.

summary.title: Access Tokens for Conversational Agents Discontinued
summary.summary: Service agent access tokens for conversational agents are no longer supported and have been discontinued. Service accounts are now recommended for authentication.

2025-06-12.content: **Data store handlers**: Data store handler use tracking for billing purposes has been corrected.

summary.title: Data store billing tracking corrected
summary.summary: Tracking for billing purposes in data store handlers has been corrected.
